author: Special Correspondent
text:
Mobility aid distributed

Sterlite Copper distributed mobility aid to persons with disabilities at a function at Lucia Centre for the Physically Challenged here on Sunday. Anup Agarwal, Chief Financial Officer, Sterlite Copper, and P. Divakaran, Head-Operations and Engineering Services, distributed mobility aid to 137 differently abled people in the presence of Rev. Fr. Clarence Dinesh, Director, Lucia Society, Thoothukudi, and S. Sunder, chairman, Freedom Trust, Chennai.

The devices included wheelchairs, crutches and artificial limbs
title: Mobility aid distributed to physically challenged
